title: Skin Shards & Gifting
body: I have recently gotten a legacy skin shard, and since I do not play the character I wish to gift it after upgrading it, can anyone tell me whether you can gift skins that you got and upgraded using skin shards?  Thanks.

replies.body: As of right now, we don't have a system that lets you trade skins you already own or gift someone a shard you obtained. I'm not sure if something like this is already in the works, but it'd be a pretty neat feature I think! You should post this over in Client Discussion to see what other players think about this too!
